mapper.sql: select su.id, su.username, su.nick_name, su.created_time, su.role_ids, su.role_names, su.dept_ids, su.dept_names, su.post_ids, su.post_names from sys_user su where su.deleted = 0 group by su.id
mapper.select: select su.id, su.username, su.nick_name, su.created_time, group_concat(sr.name order by sr.sort) as roleNames, group_concat(sp.name order by sp.sort) as postNames, sd.name deptName from sys_user su left join sys_role_user sru on su.id = sru.user_id left join sys_role sr on sru.role_id = sr.id left join sys_post_user spu on su.id = spu.user_id left join sys_post sp on spu.post_id = sp.id left join sys_dept_user sdu on su.id = sdu.user_id left join sys_dept sd on sdu.dept_id = sd.id where su.deleted = 0 and su.id = #{id} group by su.id
